title.rendered: Australia record their highest-ever successful chase against India T20I cricket

content.rendered:
On Tuesday, Australia chased down 209 for a win against India in the first T20 in Mohali. Opener Cameron Green (61 off 30 balls), and Matthew Wade’s unbeaten 45 off 21 balls took Australia to win.  It was Australia’s highest successful T20I run chase against the host India. Earlier, for a win, they have overhauled 191 target against India on February 27 in 2019.

Read also:India vs Australia: Virat Kohli’s Reaction To Umesh Yadav Being Hit For Boundaries Becomes An Instant Meme
